overview:
Sasha Skotecky is a Web Designer based in Victoria, B.C. Canada.

Sasha Skotecky was born and raised in Montreal and is fluent in English and French. He has always been artistically inclined and is passionate about technology and creating abstract and surreal art on canvas.

Sasha is trained in classical 2D animation, Flash animation, computer assisted illustration and more recently, Web development. To view some of his past work and creations please visit <a href="http://www.skotecky.com>skotecky.com</a>

Sasha has been a graphic designer since 2001. He moved to beautiful British Columbia in 2005 and currently resides Victoria.

Sasha Skotecky Design is now excited to offer a full range of Web development services from conception to online implementation. To view a price list of all the services Sasha Skotecky Design offers, please visit http://www.skotecky.com
